phpgsg.config.title: Getter Setter Generator
phpgsg.config.getter.description: Template for getter methods. Use {{name}}, {{type}}, {{variable}} and {{nullable}} as placeholders.
phpgsg.config.setter.description: Template for setter methods. Use {{name}}, {{type}}, and {{nullable}} as placeholders.
phpgsg.config.autoGenerate.description: Skip the quick pick window and automatically generate all available getter/setter methods
phpgsg.config.sortBy.description: Sort getters and setters by property order
